short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen to barcode scanner input from any website and redirect to the return in Returnless or your connected integration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the Barcode Scanner Extension for Google Chrome Browser to easily scan your return parcels. 

The extensions enables Returnless users to scan the tracking number barcode on the shipping label. The return related to this shipment and all its details will then be opened in the Returnless panel for easy processing.

To use this extension you need to be a Returnless user. For more information about Returnless, go here: www.returnless.com
